title: Post-Breakup Trauma & Dating Again
description:
Inspired by a viewer submitted question, Lauren and Jeremy discuss the lasting effects after a breakup and the common sentiment of feeling “damaged”. The couple also does a deep dive into the intricacies of Lauren’s feelings post-breakup.
